titleInfo.title: A dynamical system approach to SOC models of Zhang's type

mods.abstract: We discuss Zhang's model of SOC in the framework of hyperbolic dynamical systems with singularities. The fractal structure of the invariant energy distribution, correlation decay-like phenomena, and symbolic coding are discussed.

bibliographicCitation.apa_indent: Blanchard, P., Cessac, B., & Krüger, T. (1997). A dynamical system approach to SOC models of Zhang's type. JOURNAL OF STATISTICAL PHYSICS, 88(1-2), 307-318.
